adjectives.description: blazed (comparative more blazed, superlative most blazed)

entries.meaning: (slang) Under the influence of marijuana, usually at a relatively high dose.
examples: Synonyms: stoned, baked, reefed, lifted, high, lit, blitzed, up there; see also Thesaurus:stoned
I could tell by his bloodshot eyes that he was pretty blazed.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of blaze
